title: Ars Technica
description: Ars Technica is recognized in the technology and media industry for its distinctive brand colors: a vibrant orange (#FF4E00) and a refreshing green (#01CD74). These colors are prominently showcased on their official website, http://arstechnica.com, and detailed further in their branding assets available at https://brandingguide.app/brand/ars-technica/assets.
